pullRequest.title: Add stories for SearchResultList component
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist


 the contributor license agreement is signed
 commit message follows commit guidelines
 tests are included

Description of change

#1306
This PR adds three stories for the SearchResultList component:

No results found
Basic list of results
Loading results page (with spinner)

commit.message: Update SearchResultList stories to use storybook controls. Still using older addon-actions for nested props
add the knobs dependancy back in

nodes.bodyText:
the difference between this and

  
    
      openEQUELLA/Source/Plugins/Core/com.equella.core/js/.storybook/main.ts
    
    
        Lines 4 to 5
      in
      03242c2
    
    
    
    

        
          
           "@storybook/addon-essentials", 
        

        
          
           "@storybook/addon-a11y", 
        
    
  


could cause merge conflicts down the road.
If possible consider merging develop into this branch again.

another place where these changes may conflict with

  
    
      openEQUELLA/Source/Plugins/Core/com.equella.core/js/package.json
    
    
        Lines 74 to 76
      in
      815d103

           "@storybook/addon-essentials": "6.0.16", 
        

        
          
           "@storybook/react": "6.0.16", 
        
    
  


from develop.
merging branches may make things easier long term.

+import {
+  getEmptySearchResult as emptySearch,
+  getSearchResult as singlePageSearch,
+} from "../../__mocks__/getSearchResult";
+import { defaultSearchOptions } from "../../tsrc/modules/SearchModule";
+import {
+  SearchResultList,
+  SearchResultListProps,
+} from "../../tsrc/search/components/SearchResultList";
+import { action } from "@storybook/addon-actions";
+
+export default {
+  title: "Search/SearchResultList",
+  component: SearchResultList,
+  argTypes: {
+    onClearSearchOptions: { action: "onClearSearchOptions called" },
+  },
+} as Meta<SearchResultListProps>;
+
+const sharedPaginationArgs = {
+  currentPage: defaultSearchOptions.currentPage,
+  rowsPerPage: defaultSearchOptions.rowsPerPage,
+  /* I wasn't able to get nested actions to work inside argTypes, so falling back to the old addon-actions for these. See https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/issues/11525 and https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/issues/10979#issuecomment-657640744*/

nodes.bodyText:
there's a mix of version 6.0.16 and 6.0.17 here for storybook.
does version 6.0.17 exist for all the storybook packages?

this looks like this looks like it is synced with component/new-search-page but still missing some changes from develop.
preset-typescript is no longer needed with storybook 6.

  
    
      openEQUELLA/Source/Plugins/Core/com.equella.core/js/package.json
    
    
        Lines 74 to 76
      in
      815d103
    
    
    
    

        
          
           "@storybook/addon-a11y": "6.0.16", 
        

        
          
           "@storybook/addon-essentials": "6.0.16", 
        

        
          
           "@storybook/react": "6.0.16",

commit.message:
Delete prettier.xml

Remove prettier file that shouldn't have been included in commit

nodes.bodyText:
This is the goods. This is hard to test with React Testing Library as it's all kind of real time. But we have an enzyme test which tests it based on stepping through with component.update().
Now that I know this is at least covered here, I'll remove the test and stop trying to refactor it. Thanks @mrblippy !

+import type { Meta, Story } from "@storybook/react";
+import * as React from "react";
+import {
+  getEmptySearchResult as emptySearch,
+  getSearchResult as singlePageSearch,
+} from "../../__mocks__/getSearchResult";
+import { defaultSearchOptions } from "../../tsrc/modules/SearchModule";
+import {
+  SearchResultList,
+  SearchResultListProps,
+} from "../../tsrc/search/components/SearchResultList";
+import { action } from "@storybook/addon-actions";
+
+export default {
+  title: "Search/SearchResultList",
+  component: SearchResultList,
+  argTypes: {
+    onClearSearchOptions: { action: "onClearSearchOptions called" },
+  },
+} as Meta<SearchResultListProps>;
+
+const sharedPaginationArgs = {
+  currentPage: defaultSearchOptions.currentPage,
+  rowsPerPage: defaultSearchOptions.rowsPerPage,
+  /* I wasn't able to get nested actions to work inside argTypes, so falling back to the old addon-actions for these. See https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/issues/11525 and https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/issues/10979#issuecomment-657640744*/
+  onPageChange: action("onRowsPerPageChange"),
+  onRowsPerPageChange: action("onRowsPerPageChange"),
+};
+
+export const EmptyResultListComponent: Story<SearchResultListProps> = (
+  args
+) => <SearchResultList {...args}></SearchResultList>;
+
+EmptyResultListComponent.args = {
+  searchResultItems: emptySearch.results,
+  showSpinner: false,
+  paginationProps: {
+    ...sharedPaginationArgs,
+    count: emptySearch.available,
+  },
+  orderSelectProps: {
+    onChange: action("onChange called"),
+    value: defaultSearchOptions.sortOrder,
+  },
+};
+
+export const BasicSearchResultListComponent: Story<SearchResultListProps> = (
+  args
+) => <SearchResultList {...args}></SearchResultList>;
+
+BasicSearchResultListComponent.args = {
+  ...EmptyResultListComponent.args,
+  searchResultItems: singlePageSearch.results,
+  paginationProps: {
+    ...sharedPaginationArgs,
+    count: singlePageSearch.available,
+  },
+};
+
+export const LoadingSearchResultListComponent: Story<SearchResultListProps> = (
+  args
+) => <SearchResultList {...args}></SearchResultList>;
+
+LoadingSearchResultListComponent.args = {
+  ...BasicSearchResultListComponent.args,
+  showSpinner: true,
